actions/deleteMessage/confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
actions/loadLastModel/tooltip: Click to load the model that was last used with this chat ({{lastModel}})
actions/loadLastModel/error: Failed to load last used model.
actions/changeToLastUsedModel/error: Failed to change to last used model.
actions/changeToLastUsedModel/tooltip: You used a different model last time you sent a message in this chat. Click to unload the currently selected model ({{currentModel}}) and load the model that was last used with this chat ({{lastModel}})
